The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Category:Waist items

From DDO wiki

⇑ ⇑ Back to top ⇑ ⇑
Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Belts, girdles, sashes etc.

Belts can be worn around your waist occupying your waist slot. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Belt of the Mroranon
  • Strength +5 Strength +5: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Fortification +73%Fortification +73%: +73% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Vitality +17Vitality +17: Passive: +17 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Mroranon's MightMroranon's Might: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +1 Artifact bonus to Strength
    +5 Artifact bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
 9 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Plane of Night Raid Warded Chest
Lion-headed Belt Buckle
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
  • RoarRoar: This item emits a frightening roar when melee attackers score a critical hit on the wearer, causing them to resist or be shaken with fear.
  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • The Desert's Burning SunThe Desert's Burning Sun: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +2% Artifact bonus to Fire Spellcrit Chance
    +10 Artifact bonus to Fire Spellpower
    +5 Artifact bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
 11 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Zawabi's Revenge Raid Warded chest

    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness

    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments

  • Greater ArdorGreater Ardor: When Activated, this effect provides a +20 Alchemical bonus to your Healing Spell Power for three minutes. - 3 Charges (Recharged/Day: 3)

Ann Velsing's Belt
  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Undead GuardUndead Guard: This armor burns those Undead that attack the wearer, causing 3d8 Good damage on a successful melee attack.
  • Hunter of the DeadHunter of the Dead: 3 extra uses of Remove Disease per rest. If have Hunter of the Dead III Enhancement: additional weapon damage versus Undead.
 18 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Bastion of Power Any end chest ; Tower of Despair, Nythirios chest
Awanahu Sash
  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Proof Against Poison +6 Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • AssassinAssassin: Bonus to hit and damage with sneak attacks (+2 to hit and +5 damage from attacks considered sneak attacks[both non-stacking even if it say exceptional]), 20% less threat. If have Assassin III Enhancement: chance with weapons to apply a Level Drain effect.

  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Seeker +2 Seeker +2: Provides a +2 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +2 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • RavagerRavager: Chance to inflict damage over time effect (Ravager's Cut: 2d6 slashing damage vs creatures that can bleed on melee hit or glancing blow plus four rounds of additional damage. Does not work with handwraps.This is working as intended.)

  • Fortification +25%Fortification +25%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 25% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.

  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Heightened Awareness 1Heightened Awareness 1: This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +1 Insight bonus to AC.

 18 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Sins of Attrition Any chest ; Tower of Despair, Nythirios chest
Mechanic's Belt
  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Proof Against Poison +6 Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).

Skullduggery Kit (Level 25)
  • Intelligence Skills - Exceptional Bonus +4Intelligence Skills - Exceptional Bonus +4: Passive +4 Exceptional bonus to the Intelligence based skills of: Disable Device, Repair, Search, and Spellcraft
  • Dexterity Skills - Exceptional Bonus +4Dexterity Skills - Exceptional Bonus +4: Passive +4 Exceptional bonus to the Dexterity based skills of: Balance, Hide, Move Silently, Open Lock, and Tumble
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • One of the following bonuses:

 27 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Flesh Maker's Laboratory (epic) End Chest
Epic Purging the Pantheon
  • Improved Quelling StrikesImproved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: applies a Quell effect to target enemy for six seconds, rendering them unable to cast divine spells. This has a 50% chance of preventing the target from casting all spells for three seconds (12 second cooldown).
  • Fortification +142%Fortification +142%: +142% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Protection +10Protection +10: Passive: +10 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fire Absorption +34% Fire Absorption +34%: Passive: 34% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)

  • Spell Save +5 Spell Save +5: This item gives a +5 Resistance bonus to your saves versus spells.
  • Protection from Evil +2Protection from Evil +2: You have a +2 Deflection bonus to AC, and a +2 Resistance bonus to Saves vs Evil Monsters.

Legendary Green Steel Belt
  • Legendary Taint of ShavarathLegendary Taint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons feed their bloodlust on enemies, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the Legendary Taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed more and more upon the wielder. Perhaps there is a way to appease this item...

Chain of Manacles
  • Repair Amplification +25Repair Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming repair healing by +25 (Enhancement bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Vitality +21Vitality +21: Passive: +21 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Fortification +84%Fortification +84%: +84% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Sheltering +16 Sheltering +16: +16 Enhancement bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Epic Belt of Myriad Pockets
  • Insightful Constitution +4Insightful Constitution +4: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +4 insight bonus to Constitution.
  • Physical Sheltering +24 Physical Sheltering +24: +24 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Protection +8Protection +8: Passive: +8 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +9Shield +9: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +9 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

    • Named: Category:Green augments

Epic Snakeskin Belt
  • Insightful Dexterity +4Insightful Dexterity +4: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +4 insight bonus to Dexterity.
  • Parrying +4Parrying +4: +4 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +4 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • Seeker +9 Seeker +9: Provides a +9 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +9 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Underwater Action +17Underwater Action: You have a +17 Competence bonus to Swim and can breathe underwater.
  • Swim like a FishSwim like a Fish: While this item is equipped and you are swimming, you gain the Evasion feat. Evasion causes you to take no damage on a successful Reflex saving throw against an effect which would normally allow half damage on a successful Reflex save.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments

Legendary Siren's Belt
  • Armor Bonus +13Armor Bonus +13: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +13 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Protection +11Protection +11: Passive: +11 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +13Shield +13: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +13 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.
  • Proof Against Disease +6 Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).

Legendary Pyrefang's Collar
  • Profane Spell Focus Mastery IIProfane Spell Focus Mastery II: +2 Profane bonus to the DC of all spells.
  • Fire Lore +21%Fire Lore +21: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a 21% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Combustion +142Combustion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Fire Resistance +50Fire Resistance +50: Passive: +50 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Pyrefang's Collar
  • Profane Spell Focus Mastery IProfane Spell Focus Mastery I: +1 Profane bonus to the DC of all spells.

 31 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Isle of Dread any legendary chest; or Dread saga legendary end reward
Legendary Belt of the Black Sands
  • Constitution +14 Constitution +14: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Invisibility GuardInvisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Isle of Dread: Claw Slot (Accessory): EmptyIsle of Dread: Claw Slot (Accessory):
    Apply a dino bone augment to this item.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

Admiral's Cummerbund
  • Physical Sheltering +11 Physical Sheltering +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Parrying +2Parrying +2: +2 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +2 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • Law Absorption +14% Law Absorption +14%: Passive: 14% Enhancement Bonus to Law Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Chaos Absorption +14% Chaos Absorption +14%: Passive: 14% Enhancement Bonus to Chaos Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)

Belt of Whirling Blades
  • Tendon Slice +6 Tendon Slice +6: On Hit: 6% chance to slow target's movement by 50% for 6 seconds.
  • Doublestrike 9% Doublestrike 9%: Passive: 9% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Deception +6 Deception +6: +6 Enhancement bonus to hit and +9 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Insightful Combat Mastery +3Insightful Combat Mastery +3: +3 Insight bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.

Legendary Belt of Whirling Blades
  • Tendon Slice +11 Tendon Slice +11: On Hit: 6% chance to slow target's movement by 50% for 11 seconds.
  • Doublestrike 15% Doublestrike 15%: Passive: 15% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Deception +11 Deception +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to hit and +17 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Insightful Combat Mastery +6Insightful Combat Mastery +6: +6 Insight bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

    • Fortification: +25% to +100%

    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock

  • Quality Dexterity +3Quality Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 quality bonus to Dexterity.
  • Insightful Doubleshot 5%Insightful Doubleshot 5%: Passive: 5% Insight bonus to Doubleshot. (Doubleshot is a chance to score an additional hit with a ranged attack.)
  • Cannith Combat InfusionCannith Combat Infusion: Your ranged and melee attacks have a chance to cause this item to inject a Cannith Combat Infusion into your bloodstream. For the next ten seconds, this will grant a +4 Alchemical bonus to Strength, Constitution and Dexterity, as well as a 5% Alchemical bonus to your chance to doublestrike and a +2 Alchemical bonus to Armor Class.
  • Utter Disintegration GuardUtter Disintegration Guard: This item has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies that strike you and attempts to disintegrate them. This disintegrate is incredibly powerful, and will utterly destroy weaker foes.
  • Taint of EvilTaint of Evil: Good aligned characters equipping this item suffer a temporary negative level until the item is removed.

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Legendary Forbidden KnowledgeLegendary Forbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +30 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +3 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +4 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +15 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +25 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +3 Profane bonus to Spell DCs
 32 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Unholy Defiler of the Hidden Hand defiled version of Legendary Bladesworn Bandolier
Buckle of Assimilation
  • Quality Strength +3Quality Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +3 quality bonus to Strength.
  • Insightful Doublestrike 8%Insightful Doublestrike 8%: Passive: 8% Insight bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Cannith Combat InfusionCannith Combat Infusion: Your ranged and melee attacks have a chance to cause this item to inject a Cannith Combat Infusion into your bloodstream. For the next ten seconds, this will grant a +4 Alchemical bonus to Strength, Constitution and Dexterity, as well as a 5% Alchemical bonus to your chance to doublestrike and a +2 Alchemical bonus to Armor Class.
  • Utter Disintegration GuardUtter Disintegration Guard: This item has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies that strike you and attempts to disintegrate them. This disintegrate is incredibly powerful, and will utterly destroy weaker foes.
  • Taint of EvilTaint of Evil: Good aligned characters equipping this item suffer a temporary negative level until the item is removed.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
